alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 12:13AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Guadalupe, north central Wilson and east central Bexar Counties through 100 AM CST... At 1212 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Berlin, or 7 miles southeast of Cibolo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schertz, Seguin, Cibolo, McQueeney, St. Hedwig, La Vernia, Marion, New Berlin, Zuehl, Geronimo, Nolte, Zipp and Friendly Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
